overview:
As CEO and Co-founder, Michael Koshet, developed and created Help-Me-Rent Magazine.com in 2009, a new, revolutionary company and publication that enables affiliate home rental website users across America â€“ such as landlords and property owners â€“ to upgrade their classified listings in an additional regional print format.

He also successfully developed and created Help-Me-Rent, Inc - the largest independently owned and operated residential property leasing firm in greater Los Angeles between 2007-2009.

Youngest top-producing real estate agent amongst over 1400 active employees at Rodeo Realty in Beverly Hills, California from 2004-2007. Worked alongside most reputable residential and commercial real estate agents in greater Los Angeles and Beverly Hills. Average acquisition of one dozen new clients and 15-20 residential real estate listings every month.

Specialties Building Internet services and creating print media for both consumers and businesses.

Internet Entrepreneur, CEO, Philanthropist, Technology Advisor, Leasing, Marketing
